import Header from '../components/header' import withUI from '../shared/MUI/withMUI' import {Card, CardHeader, CardText} from 'material-ui/Card' import 'isomorphic-fetch' import { RaisedButton } from 'material-ui' import Link from 'next/link' const Post = ({ title, content}) =>
Go back to blog
Post.getInitialProps = async ({ query: {id}}) => { const response = await fetch(`${process.env.BLOGGER_URL}/${id}?key=${process.env.API_KEY}`); const data = await response.json(); const title = data.title; const content = data.content; return { title, content } }; export default withUI(Post);
